Step into the world of Olympic legend Kerri Pottharst OAM OLY, where the pursuit of excellence doesn't end at the medal podium. In this captivating episode, we explore how a beach volleyball champion continues to make waves long after leaving the sand. Kerri's gold medal at the Sydney 2000 Olympics was just the beginning. Now, she's scoring wins in the game of life and longevity. Discover the mindset that propelled her to the top and keeps her thriving decades later. From mentoring rising stars to inspiring corporate leaders, Kerri shares her playbook for success at any age. The Pod is out now! #thelongevitylounge

Our next door neighbor's 15-year-old grandson broke two of our windows üò± ...and I'm not even mad ü§∑üèª‚ôÄÔ∏è You see, Louis is probably the most single-mindedly dedicated person I know. His focus? Hockey. (I know embarrassingly little about what I usually call "sportsball," but I do know Long Islanders are obsessed with hockey). Every single day, before and after school, Louis is out on the deck shooting pucks (that's what the hockey sportsballs are called, right?) into a net on their miniature makeshift hockey "rink." Tzvi Doron, DO and I always say, if either of us had the level of dedication to literally anything in our lives that Louis has to hockey, we'd be the most successful people in the world. It's super impressive to watch that level of commitment and drive ‚Äî especially in a 15-year-old! Of course, I'd probably prefer if he aimed his pucks away from my windows ü§£ But every time I feel unmotivated to keep pushing forward on my goals ‚Äî in business, martial arts, or any other arena ‚Äî I peek outside to see Louis practicing and remind myself my progress is only as good as the effort I put in. #hardwork #motivation #smallbusinessowner #entrepreneurship

What do sports and leadership have in common? Both require discipline, teamwork, and a never-give-up attitude! As a team captain and a nominee for the AP CM Cup Basketball Tournament, I've learned the importance of leading both on and off the court. Leading team to victory in various tournaments across disciplines, including basketball, volleyball, and netball, has not only honed my athletic skills but has also strengthened my leadership and strategic thinking abilities. üôå How have your sports experiences shaped your professional journey? #Leadership #Teamwork #Sportsmanship #ProfessionalGrowth

What truly makes a GOAT? For me, it's not just about the numbers, but also about their mental fortitude and compassion for others. One tennis player who embodies these qualities is advocating for more revenue to be shared with lower-ranked players. This is a true show of leadership and sportsmanship. Although the chart may be dated, I look forward to updating it once this GOAT retires, which is estimated to be between 2040 and 2050. #tennis #leadership #sportsmanship
